TEXT.French: - %d1 colon(s) dans les colonies (%d2 or/unité): %d3 or/tour

TEXT.English: - Bonus / improving overall productivity - %d1%% increase due to the presence of statesmen: %d2 gold/turn
TEXT.French: - Bonus/amélioration productivité globale - %d1%% de majoration dû à la présence des hommes d'état : %d2 or/tour
TEXT.German: - Bonus / improving overall productivity - %d1%% increase due to the presence of statesmen: %d2 gold/turn
TEXT.Italian: - Bonus / improving overall productivity - %d1%% increase due to the presence of statesmen: %d2 gold/turn
TEXT.Spanish: - Bonus / improving overall productivity - %d1%% increase due to the presence of statesmen: %d2 gold/turn

TEXT.English: Men state considerably increases the productivity of your colonies. The more you have, the more you increase the income received on the colonists.
TEXT.French: Les hommes d'état augmente considérablement la productivité de vos colonies. Plus vous en aurez, plus vous majorerez les revenus perçus sur les colons.[NEWLINE]
TEXT.German: Men state considerably increases the productivity of your colonies. The more you have, the more you increase the income received on the colonists.
TEXT.Italian: Men state considerably increases the productivity of your colonies. The more you have, the more you increase the income received on the colonists.
TEXT.Spanish: Men state considerably increases the productivity of your colonies. The more you have, the more you increase the income received on the colonists.

TEXT.English: - %d1 land forces inside colonies (%d2 gold/unit): %d3 gold/turn
TEXT.French: - %d1 unités militaires à l'intérieur des colonies (%d2 or/unité) : %d3 or/tour
TEXT.German: - %d1 land forces inside colonies (%d2 gold/unit): %d3 gold/turn
TEXT.Italian: - %d1 land forces inside colonies (%d2 gold/unit): %d3 gold/turn
TEXT.Spanish: - %d1 land forces inside colonies (%d2 gold/unit): %d3 gold/turn

TEXT.English: - %d1 land forces outside colonies (%d2 gold/unit): %d3 gold/turn
TEXT.French: - %d1 unités militaires à l'extérieur des colonies (%d2 or/unité) : %d3 or/tour
TEXT.German: - %d1 land forces outside colonies (%d2 gold/unit): %d3 gold/turn
TEXT.Italian: - %d1 land forces outside colonies (%d2 gold/unit): %d3 gold/turn
TEXT.Spanish: - %d1 land forces outside colonies (%d2 gold/unit): %d3 gold/turn

TEXT.English: This number takes into account all the onboard crews in merchant ships. [NEWLINE]Any crew outside a ship will be considered as unemployed.
TEXT.French: Ce nombre prend en compte tous les équipages de navire embarqués dans des navires marchands.[NEWLINE]Tout équipage en dehors d'un navire sera considéré comme étant sans activité.
TEXT.German: This number takes into account all the onboard crews in merchant ships. [NEWLINE]Any crew outside a ship will be considered as unemployed.
TEXT.Italian: This number takes into account all the onboard crews in merchant ships. [NEWLINE]Any crew outside a ship will be considered as unemployed.
TEXT.Spanish: This number takes into account all the onboard crews in merchant ships. [NEWLINE]Any crew outside a ship will be considered as unemployed.

TEXT.English: This number takes into account all the onboard crews in military ships. [NEWLINE]Any crew outside a ship will be considered as unemployed.
TEXT.French: Ce nombre prend en compte tous les équipages de navire embarqués dans des navires militaires.[NEWLINE]Tout équipage en dehors d'un navire sera considéré comme étant sans activité.
TEXT.German: This number takes into account all the onboard crews in military ships. [NEWLINE]Any crew outside a ship will be considered as unemployed.
TEXT.Italian: This number takes into account all the onboard crews in military ships. [NEWLINE]Any crew outside a ship will be considered as unemployed.
TEXT.Spanish: This number takes into account all the onboard crews in military ships. [NEWLINE]Any crew outside a ship will be considered as unemployed.

TEXT.English: Do not let the units without activity. Each turn, they cost you money and can slow down European immigration.
TEXT.French: Ne laissez pas des unités sans activité. Chaque tour, elles vous coûtent de l'or et elles peuvent ralentir l'immigration européenne.
TEXT.German: Do not let the units without activity. Each turn, they cost you money and can slow down European immigration.
TEXT.Italian: Do not let the units without activity. Each turn, they cost you money and can slow down European immigration.
TEXT.Spanish: Do not let the units without activity. Each turn, they cost you money and can slow down European immigration.

TEXT.French: Dette contractée auprès de l'Europe - Total :

TEXT.English: This debt includes vessels purchased and the unpaid charges of previous turns
TEXT.French: Cette dette englobe les achats de navires et les charges impayées des tours précédents
TEXT.German: This debt includes vessels purchased and the unpaid charges of previous turns
TEXT.Italian: This debt includes vessels purchased and the unpaid charges of previous turns
TEXT.Spanish: This debt includes vessels purchased and the unpaid charges of previous turns

TEXT.English: (This screen is for all units you have under your control (colonists, agronomists, pioneers, explorers, soldiers and sailors))
TEXT.French: (Cet écran concerne toutes les unités que vous avez sous votre contrôle (colons, agronomes, pionniers, explorateurs, militaires et marins))
TEXT.German: (This screen is for all units you have under your control (colonists, agronomists, pioneers, explorers, soldiers and sailors))
TEXT.Italian: (This screen is for all units you have under your control (colonists, agronomists, pioneers, explorers, soldiers and sailors))
TEXT.Spanish: (This screen is for all units you have under your control (colonists, agronomists, pioneers, explorers, soldiers and sailors))

TEXT.English: Click here to launch the popup "Record - Income and Expenditures".
TEXT.French: Cliquez ici pour lancer le popup "Registre - Revenus et charges".
TEXT.German: Click here to launch the popup "Record - Income and Expenditures".
TEXT.Italian: Click here to launch the popup "Record - Income and Expenditures".
TEXT.Spanish: Click here to launch the popup "Record - Income and Expenditures".

TEXT.English: Without colony, you could not have any income or expenditures. [NEWLINE]You should have at least one colony to see statistics appear.
TEXT.French: En absence de colonie, il ne peut y avoir de revenus et charges.[NEWLINE]Vous devez en détenir au moins une pour voir apparaitre des statistiques.
TEXT.German: Without colony, you could not have any income or expenditures. [NEWLINE]You should have at least one colony to see statistics appear.
TEXT.Italian: Without colony, you could not have any income or expenditures. [NEWLINE]You should have at least one colony to see statistics appear.
TEXT.Spanish: Without colony, you could not have any income or expenditures. [NEWLINE]You should have at least one colony to see statistics appear.

TEXT.English: WARNING. [NEWLINE]Statistics, you have below, take into account the number of existing units in the previous turn. [NEWLINE]If you add a colonist or if you lose one, it will be visible and taken into account at the next turn.
TEXT.French: ATTENTION.[NEWLINE]Les statistiques, que vous avez sous vos yeux, tiennent compte du nombre d'unités existantes au tour précédent.[NEWLINE]Si vous ajoutez un colon ou si vous en perdez un, il ne sera visible et pris en compte qu'au tour suivant.
TEXT.German: WARNING. [NEWLINE]Statistics, you have below, take into account the number of existing units in the previous turn. [NEWLINE]If you add a colonist or if you lose one, it will be visible and taken into account at the next turn.
TEXT.Italian: WARNING. [NEWLINE]Statistics, you have below, take into account the number of existing units in the previous turn. [NEWLINE]If you add a colonist or if you lose one, it will be visible and taken into account at the next turn.
TEXT.Spanish: WARNING. [NEWLINE]Statistics, you have below, take into account the number of existing units in the previous turn. [NEWLINE]If you add a colonist or if you lose one, it will be visible and taken into account at the next turn.
